<EffectDescription>Air Guard: This item stores the incredible, dynamic power of the air deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, knocking enemies over or speeding up the wearer with rushing winds.</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>Anthem: When wielded by a character with Bard levels, this item begins to hum an inspiring tune. Your bard songs regenerate slowly over time.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <DisplayName>Anthem Melody: Imperial Resonance</DisplayName> <Type>SpellPower</Type> <Bonus>Exceptional</Bonus> <AmountVector size="3">0 0 30</AmountVector> <SpellPower>Sonic</SpellPower> </Effect> <Effect> <DisplayName>Anthem Melody: Imperial Resonance</DisplayName> <Type>SpellLore</Type> <Bonus>Exceptional</Bonus> <AmountVector size="3">0 0 15</AmountVector> <SpellPower>Sonic</SpellPower> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>%type% Accuracy %v1%: Passive: %v1% %type% bonus to Attack rolls.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>AttackBonus</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <Weapon>All</Weapon> </Effect>
<EffectDescription>Anthem Melody - Bulwark: While your Anthem is 3 or above, your Inspire Greatness grants you and your allies an additional +3 PRR</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>%type% Armor Bonus %v1%: This item surrounds the wearer with an invisible but tangible field of force, granting %v1% armor bonus to AC, just as though you were wearing armor.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>ACBonus</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>%type% Armor Mastery %v1%: Passive: %v1% %type% bonus to the Max Dex Bonus of your equipped light, medium or heavy armor. This benefit does not apply to the Max Dex Bonus of a Tower Shield</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>MaxDexBonus</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>%type% Armor-Piercing %v1%: %v1% %type% bonus to bypass enemy fortification.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>FortificationBypass</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>%type% Assassinate %v1%: %v1% %type% bonus to the DC of Assassinate attempts.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>TacticalDC</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <Tactical>Assassinate</Tactical> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>%type% Attack Bonus %v1%: Provides a %v1% %type% bonus to your attack rolls.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>AttackBonus</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <Weapon>All</Weapon> </Effect> <Effect> <Type>CriticalAttackBonus</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <Weapon>All</Weapon> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Blurry: Equipping this item causes you to become slightly blurry. Enemies have a 20% chance to miss due to concealment.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>Displacement</Type> <Bonus>Enhancement</Bonus> <Amount>20</Amount> <ApplyAsItemEffect/> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>%type% Combat Mastery %v1%: %v1% %type% bonus to the DC to resist Trip, Improved Trip, Sunder, Improved Sunder, Stunning Blow and Stunning Fist attempts.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>TacticalDC</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <Tactical>Trip</Tactical> <Tactical>Sunder</Tactical> <Tactical>Stun</Tactical> <Tactical>General</Tactical> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>%type% Deadly %v1%: %v1% %type% bonus to weapon damage.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>DamageBonus</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <Weapon>All</Weapon> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>%type% Deathblock %v1%: Passive: %v1%% %type% Bonus to Negative Energy Absorption. In addition, you are immune to magical effects that can cause instant death.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>Immunity</Type> <Bonus>Equipment</Bonus> <Immunity>Death Effects</Immunity> </Effect> <Effect> <Type>EnergyAbsorbance</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <Energy>Negative</Energy> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Deathblock: The wearer of this item is immune to magical effects that can cause instant death.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>Immunity</Type> <Bonus>Equipment</Bonus> <Immunity>Death Effects</Immunity> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>%type% Deception %v1%: %v1% %type% bonus to hit and %v2% Damage for Sneak Attacks.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>SneakAttackAttack</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect> <Effect> <Type>SneakAttackDamage</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v2%</Amount> </Effect>
<EffectDescription>Demonic Curse: Each time you are hit in melee combat this is a chance that your attacker will be cursed.</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>Demonic Might: This item gives the wearer the power of a demon, granting a %v1% Profane bonus to Strength.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>AbilityBonus</Type> <Bonus>Profane</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <Ability>Strength</Ability> </Effect>
<EffectDescription>Demonic Shield: Each time you are hit in melee combat there is a chance that a shield of demonic energy will grant you 30 temporary hit points.</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>Improved Demonic Shield: Each time you are hit in melee combat there is a chance that a shield of demonic energy will grant you 120 profane bonus to temporary hit points.</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>Demonic Retribution: Each time you are hit in melee combat there is a chance that a demonic force will strike back at your attacker hitting them with an Inflict Moderate Wounds spell.</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>Disintegration Guard: This item has a store of dark insidious power deep within. When hit in melee, this power occasionally lashes out violently at enemies an attempts to disintegrate them.</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>%type% Distant Diversion %v1%%: %v1%% %type% bonus to Decreased threat generated from ranged damage.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>ThreatBonusRanged</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect>
<EffectDescription>%type% Dodge Bonus %v1%%: %v1%% %type% bonus to Dodge.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>DodgeBonus</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect>
<EffectDescription>%type% Doubleshot %v1%%: %v1%% %type% bonus to Doubleshot chance.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>Doubleshot</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect>
<EffectDescription>%type% Doublestrike %v1%%: %v1%% %type% bonus to Doublestrike chance.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>Doublestrike</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect>
<EffectDescription>DR %v1%/-: Reduces all physical damage by %v1%/-</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>DR</Type> <Bonus>Equipment</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <DR>-</DR> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Druidic Survival Mastery: While in Wild Shape, you receive a Primal bonus to damage equal to half the number of Wilderness Lore feats you have.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>DamageBonus</Type> <Bonus>Primal</Bonus> <Amount>0.5</Amount> <Stacks>Wilderness Lore</Stacks> <AnyOfStance>Wolf</AnyOfStance> <AnyOfStance>Bear</AnyOfStance> <AnyOfStance>Winter Wolf</AnyOfStance> <AnyOfStance>Dire Bear</AnyOfStance> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Earthgrab Guard: This items stores the implacable strength of the earth deep within. When the wearer is hit in melee, this power will occasionally come to the surface calling on earth to erupt from the ground and hold an enemy in place.</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>%type% Elemental Resistance %v1%: Passive: %v1% %type% bonus to Acid, Cold, Electric, Fire and Sonic resistance.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>EnergyResistance</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <Energy>Acid</Energy> <Energy>Cold</Energy> <Energy>Electric</Energy> <Energy>Fire</Energy> <Energy>Sonic</Energy> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>%type% %energy% Resistance %v1%: Passive: %v1% %type% bonus to %energy% resistance.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>EnergyResistance</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <Energy>%energy%</Energy> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>%type% %energy% Absorption %v1%%: Passive %v1%% %type% Bonus to %energy% Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistances have been taken into account.)</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>EnergyAbsorbance</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <Energy>%energy%</Energy> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Feather Falling: This item is engraved with feathers and bestows a powerful magical effect. Whenever the wearer begins to fall from any height, this effect slows the decent dramatically, causing the wearer to fall like a feather.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>Immunity</Type> <Bonus>Equipment</Bonus> <Immunity>Falling</Immunity> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>%type% Fortification %v1%%: Passive: %v1%% %type% Bonus to Fortification.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>Fortification</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect>
<EffectDescription>Feat Mobility: While equipped, this item grants the feat Mobility.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>GrantFeat</Type> <Bonus>Equipment</Bonus> <Feat>Mobility</Feat> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Feeds Off Madness: This item greedily feeds off the aura of madness related to certain Xoriat effects. The more of these its wearer is affected by, the stronger this item will become.</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>Freedom of Movement: This item grants its wearer the ability to move and attack normally while under then influence of maic that impedes movement, such as paralysis, solid fog, slow and web.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>Immunity</Type> <Bonus>Equipment</Bonus> <Immunity>Freedom of Movement</Immunity> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Ghostly %v1%%: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a %v1%% chance to miss you due to your incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>SkillBonus</Type> <Bonus>Enhancement</Bonus> <Amount>5</Amount> <Skill>Hide</Skill> <Skill>Move Silently</Skill> </Effect> <Effect> <Type>Incorporeality</Type> <Bonus>Enhancement</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <ApplyAsItemEffect/> </Effect> <Effect> <Type>GhostTouch</Type> <Bonus>Enhancement</Bonus> <Amount>1</Amount> <Weapon>All</Weapon> </Effect>
<EffectDescription>Greater Boon of Undeath: Undead take solace in the hate of others. Every time you are struck in combat, an Inflict Moderate Wounds spell will be cast on you.</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>Greater Dispelling Guard: This item is infused with a power that purges out the magical energies of those that strike the wearer. When the wearer is hit in melee it will apply a Greater Dispel Magic effect on the attacker, stripping away its protective spells.</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>Greater Dispelling: This weapon is infused with a power that purges out the magical energies of those that it strikes. On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit it will apply a Greater Dispel Magic effect to the target, stripping away its protective spells.</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>Greater Heroism: Passive: +4 Morale bonus to Attack Rolls, Saving Throws and Skill Checks.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>SkillBonus</Type> <Bonus>Morale</Bonus> <Amount>4</Amount> <Skill>All</Skill> </Effect> <Effect> <Type>SaveBonus</Type> <Bonus>Morale</Bonus> <Amount>4</Amount> <Save>All</Save> </Effect> <Effect> <Type>AttackBonus</Type> <Bonus>Morale</Bonus> <Amount>4</Amount> <Weapon>All</Weapon> </Effect> <Effect> <Type>CriticalAttackBonus</Type> <Bonus>Morale</Bonus> <Amount>4</Amount> <Weapon>All</Weapon> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Improved Heroism: Passive: +3 Morale bonus to Attack Rolls, Saving Throws and Skill Checks.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>SkillBonus</Type> <Bonus>Morale</Bonus> <Amount>3</Amount> <Skill>All</Skill> </Effect> <Effect> <Type>SaveBonus</Type> <Bonus>Morale</Bonus> <Amount>3</Amount> <Save>All</Save> </Effect> <Effect> <Type>AttackBonus</Type> <Bonus>Morale</Bonus> <Amount>3</Amount> <Weapon>All</Weapon> </Effect> <Effect> <Type>CriticalAttackBonus</Type> <Bonus>Morale</Bonus> <Amount>3</Amount> <Weapon>All</Weapon> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Superior Heroism: Passive: +5 Morale bonus to Attack Rolls, Saving Throws and Skill Checks.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>SkillBonus</Type> <Bonus>Morale</Bonus> <Amount>5</Amount> <Skill>All</Skill> </Effect> <Effect> <Type>SaveBonus</Type> <Bonus>Morale</Bonus> <Amount>5</Amount> <Save>All</Save> </Effect> <Effect> <Type>AttackBonus</Type> <Bonus>Morale</Bonus> <Amount>5</Amount> <Weapon>All</Weapon> </Effect> <Effect> <Type>CriticalAttackBonus</Type> <Bonus>Morale</Bonus> <Amount>5</Amount> <Weapon>All</Weapon> </Effect>
<EffectDescription>%energy% Guard %v1%: When Hit in Melee: Deals %v1%d4 %energy% damage to your attacker.</EffectDescription>
<EffectDescription>Halcyon Mind: When you are damaged by an attack: 5% chance to gain 15 temporary Spell Points. These last for 1 minute or until they are used.</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>Disease Immunity: Grants its wearer immunity to disease effects.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>Immunity</Type> <Bonus>Equipment</Bonus> <Immunity>Disease</Immunity> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Blindness Immunity: Grants its wearer immunity to blindness effects.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>Immunity</Type> <Bonus>Equipment</Bonus> <Immunity>Blindness</Immunity> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Immunity to Fear: The wearer of this item is immune to all fear effects.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>Immunity</Type> <Bonus>Equipment</Bonus> <Immunity>Fear</Immunity> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Immunity to Slippery Surfaces: The wearer of this item is not affected when walking on slippery surfaces.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>Immunity</Type> <Bonus>Equipment</Bonus> <Immunity>Slippery Surfaces</Immunity> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Petrification Immunity: This item gives immunity to Petrification.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>Immunity</Type> <Bonus>Equipment</Bonus> <Immunity>Petrification</Immunity> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Improved Quelling Strikes: On Vorpal Melee: Applies Quell to the target enemy for six seconds, rendering then unable to cast divine spells. 50% chance of peventing the target from casting all spells for 3 seconds (12 second cooldown).</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>Lesser Displacement: Equipping this item causes light to distort around you. Attacks from enemies have a %v1%% chance to miss you due to concealment.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>Displacement</Type> <Bonus>Enhancement</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <ApplyAsItemEffect/> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Proof Against Disease %v1%: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural disease and also grants a %v1% Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical diseases.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>SaveBonus</Type> <Bonus>Enhancement</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <Save>Disease</Save> </Effect> <Effect> <Type>Immunity</Type> <Bonus>Equipment</Bonus> <Immunity>Natural Diseases</Immunity> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Reinforced Fists: This item surrounds your fists with kinetic energy. Your unarmed damage is boosted by one half die.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>WeaponBaseDamageBonus</Type> <Bonus>Implement</Bonus> <Amount>0.5</Amount> <Weapon>Handwraps</Weapon> <Weapon>Unarmed</Weapon> </Effect>
<EffectDescription>Remove Exhaustion: Removes any Exhaustion and Fatigue effects. (3 Uses)</EffectDescription>
<EffectDescription>%type% Resistance %v1%: %v1% %type% bonus to all saves.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>SaveBonus</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <Save>All</Save> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Riposte: When its wearer is successfully attacked in melee, this item occasionally allows you to make an immediate counter attack, dealing bludgeoning damage to the offending enemy.</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>%type% Riposte %v1%: %v1% %type% bonus to AC and to saves.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>ACBonus</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect> <Effect> <Type>SaveBonus</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <Save>All</Save> </Effect>
<EffectDescription>Roar: This item emits a frightening roar when melee attackers score a critical hit on the wearer, causing them to resist or be shaken with fear.</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>Shield Bonus %v1%: This effect protects its wielder, providing a %v1% Shield Bonus to Armor Class. This does not stack with an equipped shield.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>ACBonus</Type> <Bonus>Shield</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>%type% Sneak Attack Bonus %v1%: Provides a %v1% %type% modifier to attack bonus and a %v1% %type% bonus to damage for any attack that would qualify as a sneak attack, even if the wielder is not a Rogue.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>SneakAttackAttack</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect> <Effect> <Type>SneakAttackDamage</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Soundproof: Protects against stunning, dazing and disorientation from sound-based spells such as Soundburst and Greater Shout.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>Immunity</Type> <Bonus>Equipment</Bonus> <Immunity>Stunning, dazing and disorientation from sound based spells</Immunity> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Speed %v1%%: %v1%% Enhancement bonus to Movement Speed and a %v2%% bonus to Attack Speed.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>MovementSpeed</Type> <Bonus>Enhancement</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <ApplyAsItemEffect/> </Effect> <Effect> <Type>Alacrity</Type> <Bonus>Enhancement</Bonus> <Amount>%v2%</Amount> <Weapon>All</Weapon> <ApplyAsItemEffect/> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>%type% Spell Focus Mastery %v1%: Passive: %v1% %type% bonus to the DC of all spells.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>SpellDC</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <School>All</School> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>%type% Spell Lore %v1%: %v1% %type% Bonus to all Spells chance to Critical Hit.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>SpellLore</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <SpellPower>All</SpellPower> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>%type% %energy% Lore %v1%%: %v1%% %type% Bonus to Electric Spells chance to Critical Hit. Electrical spell critical damage is increased by adding 0.5 to the spell critical damage multiplier. this does not stack with other item effects or potions.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>SpellLore</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <SpellPower>%energy%</SpellPower> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>%type% Spell Penetration %v1%: Passive: %v1% %type% Bonus to Spell Penetration checks.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>SpellPenetrationBonus</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect>
<EffectDescription>%type% Spell Resistance %v1%: %v1% %type% bonus to spell resistance.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>SpellResistance</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect>
<EffectDescription>Spiked: On Damage: 5% chance of dealing an addition 10d6 Pierce Damage.</EffectDescription>
<EffectDescription>Spike Guard: On Being Hit in Melee: 5% chance to do 100 to 500 Pierce Damage to the Attacker.</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>Spiked: This weapon is studded with vicious spikes, causing it to deal piecing damage in addition to its normal damage types.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>DRBypass</Type> <Bonus>Equipment</Bonus> <DR>Piercing</DR> <Weapon>All</Weapon> <ApplyAsItemEffect/> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Spike-Studded: This item is reinforced with metal studs that improve your unarmed strikes. Your unarmed attacks do an additional 1 to 4 piercing damage.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <DisplayName>Spike Studded</DisplayName> <Type>WeaponOtherDamageBonus</Type> <Bonus>Stacking</Bonus> <Weapon>All</Weapon> <CriticalMultiplier/> <Dice> <Number size="4">1 1 1 1</Number> <Sides size="4">4 4 4 4</Sides> <Energy>Pierce</Energy> </Dice> <ApplyAsItemEffect/> </Effect> <Effect> <DisplayName>Spike Studded</DisplayName> <Type>WeaponOtherCriticalDamageBonus</Type> <Bonus>Stacking</Bonus> <Weapon>All</Weapon> <CriticalMultiplier/> <Dice> <Number size="4">1 1 1 1</Number> <Sides size="4">4 4 4 4</Sides> <Energy>Pierce</Energy> </Dice> <ApplyAsItemEffect/> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Staggering Blow: This item is enchanted to make your attacks send enemies reeling. When you roll a 20 on an attack with a melee weapon you will knock the target down unless it makes a DC 17 Balance check.</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>%type% Stealth Strike %v1%%: Reduces the threat generated by ranged attacks and spells by %v1%%</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>ThreatBonusRanged</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect> <Effect> <Type>ThreatBonusSpell</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Striding %v1%%: Makes the wearer more fleet of foot, giving a %v1%% bonus to run speed.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>MovementSpeed</Type> <Bonus>Enhancement</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <ApplyAsItemEffect/> </Effect>
<EffectDescription>Stone Prison Guard: This item has a chance to turn those who hit you to stone. A successful Fortitude DC17 save will negate this effect.</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>%type% Stunning %v1%: %v1% %type% bonus to the DC of your Stunning Blow/Fist abilities.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>TacticalDC</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <Tactical>Stun</Tactical> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Swim like a Fish: While this item is equipped and you are swimming, you gain the Evasion feat. Evasion causes you to take no damage on a successful Reflex saving throw against an effect which would normally allow half damage on a successful Reflex save.</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>Underwater Action: This item grants its wearer the ability to breathe water as if it were air.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>Immunity</Type> <Bonus>Equipment</Bonus> <Immunity>Drowning</Immunity> </Effect>
<EffectDescription>Vengeful Fury: On Taking Damage: Gain a 5% Insight Bonus to Doublestrike and a +4 Rage Bonus to your Attack Bonus.</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>%typ1% Vertigo %v1%: %v1% %type% bonus to the DC to resist Trip and Improved Trip attempts.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>TacticalDC</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> <Tactical>Trip</Tactical> </Effect>
<EffectDescription>Vitality %v1%: Passive: %v1% Vitality bonus to Hit points.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>Hitpoints</Type> <Bonus>Vitality</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>%type% Wizardry %v1%: Passive: %v1% %type% Bonus to Spell Points. (If you have Sorcerer or Favored Soul levels, you gain additional spell points proportionate to the ratio of those levels to other classes).</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>SpellPoints</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect>
<EffectDescription>Wondrous Craftsmanship: This item's enchantments are more powerful than is normal for an item of this level. (+2 Total Enhancement Value)</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>Elemental Spell Power: Harnessing a small amount of the power and potential of the raw elements, this item gives you a %v1% bonus to your maximum spell points. this stacks with all other bonuses except Elemental Spell Power.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>SpellPoints</Type> <Bonus>ElementalEnergy</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Greater Elemental Energy: Harnessing a small amount of the power and potential of the raw elements, this item gives you a %v1% bonus to your maximum spell points. this stacks with all other bonuses except Greater Elemental Energy.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>SpellPoints</Type> <Bonus>GreaterElementalEnergy</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Legendary Elemental Energy: Harnessing a small amount of the power and potential of the raw elements, this item gives you a %v1% bonus to your maximum spell points. this stacks with all other bonuses except Legendary Elemental Energy.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>SpellPoints</Type> <Bonus>LegendaryElementalEnergy</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect>
<EffectDescription>Profane Lifeforce %v1%: %v1% Profane bonus to Hit Points.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>Hitpoints</Type> <Bonus>Profane</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>%type% False Life %v1%: This item grants the wearer %v1% %type% bonus to maximum health.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <Type>FalseLife</Type> <Bonus>%type%</Bonus> <Amount>%v1%</Amount> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Axeblock %v1%: Passive: Reduces physical damage taken by %v2%, except from Bludgeoning or Piercing weapons.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <DisplayName>Axeblock %v1%</DisplayName> <Type>DR</Type> <Bonus>Equipment</Bonus> <Amount>%v2%</Amount> <DR>Pierce</DR> <DR>Bludgeon</DR> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Spearblock %v1%: Passive: Reduces physical damage taken by %v2%, except from Bludgeoning or Slashing weapons.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <DisplayName>Spearblock %v1%</DisplayName> <Type>DR</Type> <Bonus>Equipment</Bonus> <Amount>%v2%</Amount> <DR>Slash</DR> <DR>Bludgeon</DR> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Hammerblock %v1%: Passive: Reduces physical damage taken by %v2%, except from Slashing or Piecring weapons.</EffectDescription> <Effect> <DisplayName>Hammerblock %v1%</DisplayName> <Type>DR</Type> <Bonus>Equipment</Bonus> <Amount>%v2%</Amount> <DR>Slash</DR> <DR>Pierce</DR> </Effect>

<EffectDescription>Fire Shield (Cold): When you are successfully attacked, there is a 10% chance that a Fire Shield(Cold) will be cast on you. If this effect activates while you have an active Fire Shield(Hot) from another source, they will nullify each other.</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>Fire Shield (Cold): You permanently benefit from Fire Shield(Cold) which proects you from Fire Damage and harms those who attack you. You are permanently warded against Fire Shield(Hot)</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>Fire Shield (Hot): When you are successfully attacked, there is a 10% chance that a Fire Shield(Hot) will be cast on you. If this effect activates while you have an active Fire Shield(Cold) from another source, they will nullify each other.</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>Fire Shield (Hot): You permanently benefit from Fire Shield(Hot) which proects you from Cold Damage and harms those who attack you. You are permanently warded against Fire Shield(Cold)</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>Freezing Ice: While you are wearing this item, your melee, ranged and unarmed attacks gain the Freezing Ice ability. (When the weapon is used, an icy power occasionally comes to the surface, attempting to freeze an enemy solid and encase them in ice)</EffectDescription>

<EffectDescription>Epic Freezing Ice: While you are wearing this item, your melee, ranged and unarmed attacks gain the Freezing Ice ability. (When the weapon is used, an icy power occasionally comes to the surface, attempting to freeze an enemy solid and encase them in ice)</EffectDescription>
<EffectDescription>Spell Absorption: This effect absorbs harmful spells targeted at the wearer. (%v1% charges)</EffectDescription>
